org.rdkit.knime.util

Class EclipseUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rdkit.knime.util.EclipseUtils

  • public class EclipseUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains utility methods to work with Eclipse functionality.
    Author:
    Manuel Schwarze

    • Method Detail

      • loadImageData

        public static org.eclipse.swt.graphics.ImageData loadImageData(java.lang.Class<?> rootClass,
                                                               java.lang.String strResourcePath)
        Creates an ImageData object used in Eclipse environments. It is based on the specified class and a resource path in the context of the specified class.
        Parameters:
        rootClass - The class which loads the image as resource.
        strResourcePath - Resource path (absolute or relative to the specified root object). Must not be null. An absolute example: "/com/novartis/nibr/knime/images/loading.gif".
        Returns:

      • isRunningHeadless

        public static boolean isRunningHeadless()
        Determines if this plugin is currently running in a headless instance of KNIME. We need this to avoid calling GUI related functionality when running the plugin on a server.

      • hideView

        public static boolean hideView(java.lang.String strViewId)
        Hides the view with the specified id from the active workbench / window / page.
        Parameters:
        strViewId - View id of the view to be hidden. Can be null.
        Returns:
        True, if view was found and could be hidden. False otherwise.

      • createPreferenceLink

        public static javax.swing.JLabel createPreferenceLink(java.lang.String strLabel,
                                                      java.lang.String strPreferenceId,
                                                      Callback callback)
        Creates a label component that looks like a link and reacts on mouse clicks. When clicking it will open the Eclipse / KNIME preference dialog on the page with the specified ID.
        Parameters:
        strLabel - Link text. Must not be null.
        strPreferenceId - Preference page ID to be shown. Must not be null.
        callback - Callback method to be called after the preference dialog has been closed. Can be null.
        Returns:
        JLabel instance with activate mouse click listener.

      • createOpenViewLink

        public static javax.swing.JLabel createOpenViewLink(java.lang.String strLabel,
                                                    java.lang.String strViewId)
        Creates a label component that looks like a link and reacts on mouse clicks. When clicking it will open the specified view.
        Parameters:
        strLabel - Link text. Must not be null.
        strPreferenceId - Preference page ID to be shown. Must not be null.
        callback - Callback method to be called after the preference dialog has been closed. Can be null.
        Returns:
        JLabel instance with activate mouse click listener.

      • createAwtComposite

        public static org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite createAwtComposite(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
                                                                   java.awt.Component comp)
        Creates an Eclipse composite control from an AWT component.
        Parameters:
        parent - Parent composite. Must not be null.
        comp - AWT component to be wrapped. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        Composite or null, if creation failed.

      • showView

        public static ViewPart showView(IWorkbenchPage page,
                                java.lang.String strViewId)
        Shows an Eclipse view with the specified id in the specified page. If null is passed in it tries to use the currently active workbench page.
        Parameters:
        page - Page to become the parent of the KNIME Explorer View.
        strViewId - Id of the view to be shown.
        Returns:
        KNIME Explorer View that got activated or null.
